item.title: Das Strategy Pattern
item.description: This blog post offers an explanation of Strategy Design Pattern by Gang of Four. The examples are written in Java. A duck can fly and quack (and can do probably much more things). Image-Source: Pixabay The Problem that the strategy pattern solves Link to heading Let’s say we have a Duck class. And then we have a CityDuck (living in the city) and a WildDuck (living in the forest). We use inheritance â€“ so CityDuck and WildDuck inherit from Duck.
